basic_attack.name: Windrider Bullet
basic_attack.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50% of ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Combat Redeployment
skill.description: Dispels a debuff from an ally, allowing them to take action immediately with an ATK boost.

ultimate.name: The Belobog March
ultimate.description: Increases ATK and CRIT DMG of all allies for 2 turns.

talent.name: Leading the Way
talent.description: Increases CRIT DMG of all allies.

technique.name: Banner of Command
technique.description: Increases ATK of all allies by 20% for the next battle.

basic_attack.name: Frost Shot
basic_attack.description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Intimidating Strike
skill.description: Grants a shield to all allies based on Gepard's DEF.

ultimate.name: Enduring Bulwark
ultimate.description: Deals AoE Ice DMG and grants a stronger shield to all allies.

talent.name: Unyielding Will
talent.description: Revives Gepard once per battle with 25% HP if knocked down.

technique.name: Force of Defense
technique.description: Starts battle with a shield based on DEF for all allies.

basic_attack.name: Sawblade Tuning
basic_attack.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Molten Detonation
skill.description: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies based on ATK.

ultimate.name: Heavenly Flare
ultimate.description: Deals massive Fire DMG to all enemies.

talent.name: Victory Rush
talent.description: Triggers a follow-up attack after breaking enemy toughness.

technique.name: Incomplete Combustion
technique.description: Starts battle by dealing Fire DMG to all enemies.

basic_attack.name: I Want to Help
basic_attack.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skill.description: Triggers a counter when Clara is attacked.

ultimate.name: Promise, Not Command
ultimate.description: Increases counter DMG and reduces DMG taken.

talent.name: Because Weâ€™re Family
talent.description: Reduces DMG taken when near Svarog.

technique.name: Small Price for Victory
technique.description: Deals AoE Physical DMG to enemies before battle.

basic_attack.name: Gravity Suppression
basic_attack.description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of ATK.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.description: Deals Imaginary DMG and slows enemies.

ultimate.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ultimate.description: Deals AoE Imaginary DMG and imprisons enemies.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.description: Slows enemies hit by basic attack.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.description: Immobilizes enemies at the start of battle.
